Name: 自在逍遥：风起 Tales of TianYuan Dynasty
About the game: 【About Game】 《Tales of TianYuan Dynasty》It is a martial arts fantasy RPG game. Xuanwei has changed dramatically, the wind is surging, you are a nobody. You threw yourself into the arena with full of enthusiasm, doing chivalrous things, exploring rich treasures, witnessing friendship, witnessing separation, and witnessing history. The world is so wide, you will choose to continue to raise the sword of chivalry on the journey, or stay away from the chaos and be alone. After the wind blows, how do you choose? 【Game Features】 -Ink and wash martial arts Abandoning the daily repetitive gameplay, the design is rich, there are gameplays you can think of, and there are also things you can't think of. -Open world, undercurrent The main plot is intertwined and intricate. The rise and fall of a dynasty, the strife of a group of people. We are both witnesses to history and deciders of the future. -Refreshing operation, clever use Martial arts are freely matched, and a variety of skill combinations are matched to create additional sparks. Numerical stacking is really easy to use, and it is also reliable to outsmart in times of adversity. -Thousands of people, thousands of faces, free and happy Refining auxiliary skills, exploring treasures and secrets, casting the strongest equipment... The rivers and lakes are huge, and there are many things to do. May you be like the wind, unfettered and free.
